headline: DAT 2025 Freight Focus Report: Shippers brace for higher truckload rates, tighter capacity as the COVID-era freight cycle ends
summary: BEAVERTON, Ore., December 12, 2024--Truckload transportation will enter 2025 firmly in a new business cycle, bringing fresh opportunities and uncertainty to freight shippers, brokers, and carriers, according to the latest annual Freight Focus Transportation & Logistics Outlook report from DAT Freight & Analytics.

content.title: DAT 2025 Freight Focus Report: Shippers brace for higher truckload rates, tighter capacity as the COVID-era freight cycle ends
